document.full_text: the new chicago superintendent of schools, jean-claude brizard, has a reputation of being hostile to rochester unions, but his image was different when he worked in brooklyn.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: 2 images of schools chief in dealing with unions
lines_and_colors: the new chicago superintendent of schools, jean-claude brizard, has a reputation of being hostile to rochester unions, but his image was different when he worked in brooklyn.
